meta.title: Timber International
meta.description: Premium oak panels and wood products from sustainable European forests

home.heroDescription: Premium oak panels crafted with traditional expertise and sustainable practices, connecting European forests to craftsmen worldwide.

journey.forestDescription: Where every great piece begins — in silence, patience, and time
journey.forestMaturingDescription: Decades of sun, rain, and stillness shape every oak before we ever arrive. Each ring is a promise of the strength our products will carry.
journey.forestHarvestingDescription: We harvest only what the forest is ready to give — honouring generations of growth with the care each tree deserves.
journey.forestRenewingDescription: For every tree we take, new life returns to the land. A covenant with the future, not a policy.
journey.sawmillDescription: The first transformation — where raw timber reveals its character
journey.sawmillGradingDescription: Not every log meets our standard. Our specialists read the timber like a score — sensing the grain, density, and hidden potential.
journey.sawmillSawingDescription: Each saw line is placed to unlock the wood's finest expression — maximising yield while respecting its natural structure.
journey.sawmillStackingDescription: Quality is not something we add later. From the first board off the saw, careful handling ensures nothing is lost.
journey.kilnDescription: The quiet discipline of drying — where patience becomes permanence
journey.kilnArrangingDescription: Every board stickered, spaced, and aligned with precision. Meticulous care most will never see, yet it defines the stability we deliver.
journey.kilnDryingDescription: We guide the moisture out gently — never rushing, never forcing. The wood tells us when it is ready, and we listen.
journey.kilnProtectingDescription: At ideal moisture content, timber is restacked and protected. This is where our promise of dimensional stability truly begins.
journey.factoryDescription: Precision engineering rooted in deep respect for the material
journey.factoryMultisawDescription: Surgical accuracy extracts optimal widths from each board. Wasting good oak means wasting the years it took to grow.
journey.factoryOpticutDescription: Intelligent crosscutting preserves every usable centimetre. Nothing worthy is left behind.
journey.factoryPlaningDescription: The planer reveals oak's true face — smooth, alive with grain. One of the most honest moments in our process.
journey.factoryFingerJointingDescription: Precision joints connect the finest parts of every board — eliminating waste, engineered to last as long as the solid wood itself.
journey.factoryGluingDescription: Under controlled pressure, individual lamellae become unified panels. Our adhesives are chosen for integrity, not cost.
journey.factoryCalibratingDescription: Wide-belt sanders bring each panel to exact thickness, measured in fractions of a millimetre. Precision you can build on.
journey.workshopDescription: Your vision, our craftsmanship — where standard becomes bespoke
journey.workshopCNCDescription: Profiles, curves, and edges shaped to your exact specifications. Technology in the service of tradition, never the other way around.
journey.workshopBondingDescription: Every custom joint is a quiet commitment — what we build together will hold together, for the lifetime of the product.
journey.workshopSandingDescription: The surface a customer touches tells them everything about the quality behind it. We make sure it speaks well.
journey.workshopFinishingDescription: Each coat seals the beauty and shields against daily life. Protection that works silently for years so the oak can speak for itself.
journey.workshopPackagingDescription: Every surface carefully wrapped and packed before it leaves our hands. Not an afterthought — a final gesture of care.
journey.warehouseDescription: Nothing leaves until it has earned the right to carry our name
journey.warehouseControllingDescription: Dimensions, moisture, surface, structure — all inspected personally. If it does not meet our standard, it does not leave our facility.
journey.warehouseStoringDescription: Labelled, documented, secured. The trust you place in us is rewarded in every detail.
journey.warehouseDeliveringDescription: The last physical act of care our team performs. Tracked, reliable, respected cargo — a product is only truly finished when it arrives safely in your hands.
journey.warehouseFeedbackDescription: We ask, we listen, we learn. Your voice shapes our future, and we are grateful for every word.
journey.ctaHeadline: From the forest floor to your workshop door.
journey.ctaSubtext: This is not just what we do. It is who we are.

footer.companyDescription: Premium oak panels and wood products. From forest to finished product, we deliver quality timber solutions for discerning professionals worldwide.
